name: Pokemon Showdown Skin - Red Edition (Regdrags)
description: We have Blue, we have Green...now we have Red - the last of the infamous trilogy of the Pokemon games. This skin uses the same fonts as the others so if you installed the custom fonts, just install the skin.
additional_info:
4/11/2016 - **FINAL RELEASE**
This will be the final release of this skin - I have went back and fixed every single issue that it has ever have. The following have been added:

Hover bgs - You'll see what I mean.
Changed the way the hovering effects interact with the mouse.
++Any other fixes (lettering color, fonts not showing up, etc.)

I will be working on Green edition soon!



3/19/16 - **FIXED THE FOLLOWING ISSUES**
Text being black at the Replay page - now it is the correct color.
Text being black at the chat log during battle - now it is the correct color.
Switched out the old tab button to a better looking one. I will be making more tweaks to those later on.

These fixes will be applied to the other skins.

3/1/16 - Skin is live *beta for now*

--Thank you guys for the positive and helpful feedback! I know the skins can be done waaay better but I will slowly improve them as time goes! =)--

*Thank you I3Ulb13 for sharing a way to have fonts uploaded via dropbox and instantly recognized by the skin without people having to install the fonts. When I have free time I will go through the code for all 3 skins and change that. =)*
*Either way if the above way doesn't seem to work, go to either my Blue or Green edition skins and install the fonts* =)

*I consider this as a 'beta' skin - a few things to tweak or 'will' be tweaked but still 100% functional.*

*Replay section may need to be edited more (I didn't get the chance to check.) - I will be sure to get to work on that when I am able!*

*Finally managed to fix a few things on this skin such as a few bars being off color - this fix + more will be added to the other skins. 

*At the battle controls - when you hover over the move options...the color is now red instead of blue. This fix will be added onto the Green edition instead it will be a green color.*

discussions.name: All 3 styles are great (Red, Green+Blue). Just needs 1 minor tweak.
